statements: SELECT * FROM purchases ORDER BY purchase_date DESC;
SELECT product_name, purchase_amount FROM purchases WHERE supplier_id = 1;
SELECT MAX(purchase_amount) AS max_purchase_amount FROM purchases;
SELECT purchase_id, product_name, purchase_amount FROM purchases WHERE purchase_amount > 500;
SELECT purchase_date, SUM(purchase_amount) AS total_purchase_amount FROM purchases GROUP BY purchase_date;
SELECT * FROM purchases WHERE purchase_date >= '2021-01-01';
SELECT purchase_id, product_name, purchase_amount FROM purchases WHERE supplier_id = 123 ORDER BY purchase_amount DESC;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_purchases, SUM(purchase_amount) AS total_amount FROM purchases WHERE purchase_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT product_name, AVG(purchase_amount) AS avg_amount FROM purchases GROUP BY product_name HAVING avg_amount > 100;
SELECT * FROM purchases ORDER BY purchase_date ASC, product_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM Purchases;
SELECT id, product_name, quantity FROM Purchases WHERE purchase_date = '2022-01-15';
SELECT supplier_name, email FROM Suppliers ORDER BY supplier_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM Purchases WHERE quantity > 10 ORDER BY unit_price DESC;
SELECT id, product_name, unit_price FROM Purchases WHERE unit_price BETWEEN 50.00 AND 100.00;
SELECT * FROM Purchases WHERE quantity > 10 ORDER BY purchase_date DESC;
SELECT product_name, unit_price, quantity FROM Purchases WHERE unit_price BETWEEN 20 AND 50;
SELECT supplier_name, contact_person FROM Suppliers WHERE contact_person LIKE '%Smith%';
SELECT id, product_name, purchase_date, unit_price, quantity FROM Purchases WHERE unit_price > 100 ORDER BY id ASC;
SELECT product_name, unit_price, quantity FROM Purchases WHERE purchase_date = '2022-05-20' ORDER BY unit_price DESC;
SELECT * FROM historical_purchases ORDER BY purchase_date DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT product_name, unit_price FROM historical_purchases WHERE purchase_date >= '2022-01-01'
SELECT supplier_name, contact_person, phone_number FROM suppliers ORDER BY supplier_name
SELECT product_name, brand, category FROM products WHERE unit_cost < 50.00
SELECT purchase_id, SUM(price) AS total_price FROM purchase_details GROUP BY purchase_id HAVING total_price > 100
SELECT * FROM historical_purchases;
SELECT purchase_id, purchase_date, product_name FROM historical_purchases WHERE unit_price > 100;
SELECT supplier_name, contact_person, contact_email FROM suppliers ORDER BY supplier_name ASC;
SELECT product_name, brand, unit_cost FROM products WHERE category = 'Electronics';
SELECT purchase_id, product_id, quantity, price FROM purchase_details WHERE price BETWEEN 50 AND 100 ORDER BY purchase_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM purchases;
SELECT product_name, unit_price FROM purchases WHERE quantity > 10;
SELECT purchase_id, supplier_id, total_cost FROM purchase_history ORDER BY purchase_date DESC;
SELECT supplier_name, contact_person, phone_number FROM suppliers WHERE supplier_id IN (1, 3, 5);
SELECT supplier_id, payment_terms, discount_rate FROM supplier_terms WHERE discount_rate > 0.05 ORDER BY supplier_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM purchases WHERE unit_price > 100 ORDER BY purchase_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT supplier_name, phone_number FROM suppliers WHERE contact_person LIKE '%John%' AND LENGTH(phone_number) > 10;
SELECT supplier_name, payment_terms, discount_rate FROM suppliers s JOIN supplier_terms t ON s.supplier_id = t.supplier_id WHERE discount_rate >= 0.1 ORDER BY supplier_name ASC;
SELECT product_name, unit_price, quantity, purchase_date FROM purchases p JOIN purchase_history h ON p.purchase_id = h.purchase_id WHERE total_cost > 1000 ORDER BY purchase_date ASC LIMIT 10;
SELECT supplier_name, purchase_date, total_cost FROM suppliers s JOIN purchase_history h ON s.supplier_id = h.supplier_id WHERE YEAR(purchase_date) = 2022 ORDER BY total_cost DESC LIMIT 3;
SELECT * FROM purchases;
SELECT product_name, quantity, unit_price FROM purchases WHERE quantity > 10;
SELECT customer_name FROM customers WHERE contact_number LIKE '%123%';
SELECT product_name, category, unit_price FROM products ORDER BY unit_price DESC;
SELECT supplier_name, email FROM suppliers WHERE supplier_name LIKE '%Inc%' ORDER BY supplier_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM purchases WHERE quantity > 10 ORDER BY unit_price DESC
SELECT supplier_name, email FROM suppliers WHERE supplier_id = 3
SELECT customer_name, email FROM customers ORDER BY customer_name ASC LIMIT 5
SELECT product_name, unit_price FROM products WHERE category = 'Electronics' ORDER BY unit_price ASC
SELECT transaction_id, customer_id, total_amount FROM transactions WHERE total_amount > 1000 ORDER BY transaction_date DESC
